name: Lumpy Space Princess
ability: The first time you replace a Creature on your turn, draw a card.

name: Princess Bubblegum
ability: Once per turn, you may deal 1 Damage to one of your Creatures. That Creature has +1 ATK this turn.

name: Albino Eyebat
ability: While Albino Eyebat has exactly 2 Damage on it, it has +2 ATK.

name: Angel Heart
ability: While Angel Heart has exactly 3 Damage on it, it has +3 ATK.

name: Angel of Chocolate
ability: Pay 1 Action >>> Heal all Damage from Angel of Chocolate.

name: Angel of Vanilla
ability: Pay 1 Action >>> Heal all Damage from Angel of Vanilla.

name: Apple Pieclops
ability: At the start of your turn, you may heal or deal 1 Damage to each Creature you control. (Choose for each Creature.)

name: Blueberry Djini
ability: When Blueberry Djini enters play, if it replaced a Creature, draw two cards.

name: Brain Gooey
ability: When Brain Gooey enters play, if it replaced a Creature, it has +2 ATK this turn.

name: Cotton Eyebat
ability: While Cotton Eyebat has exactly 4 Damage on it, it has +4 ATK.

name: Cutie
ability: FLOOP >>> You heal 1 Hit Point. (Can't go over 25.)

name: Dogboy
ability: Discard a card >>> Dogboy has +2 ATK this turn. (Use only once during each of your turns.)

name: Dragon Foot
ability: Discard a card >>> Dragon Foot has +1 ATK this turn. (Use up to five times during each of your turns.)

name: Fairy Shepard
ability: Each adjacent NiceLands Creature has +2 DEF.

name: Fatapillar
ability: +2 ATK for every 5 cards in your discard pile.

name: Future Scholar
ability: When Future Scholar enters play, if it replaced a Creature, gain 1 Action.

name: Goat
ability: When Goat enters play, if it replaced a Creature, draw a card.

name: Grape Djini
ability: When Grape Djini enters play, if it replaced a Creature, you may put a card from your discard pile on top of your deck.

name: Headphone Jerk
ability: When Headphone Jerk enters play, if it replaced a Creature, deal 3 Damage to another Creature in this Lane.

name: Herculeye
ability: Discard a card >>> Herculeye has +4 ATK this turn. (Use only once during each of your turns.)

name: Infinite Figure
ability: Discard a card >>> Deal 1 Damage to another Creature in this Lane. (Use any number of times during each of your turns.)

name: Ms. Fluff
ability: While Ms. Fluff has exactly 7 Damage on it, it has +7 ATK.

name: Niceasaurus Rex
ability: At the start of your turn, if Niceasaurus Rex has Damage on it, draw a card.

name: Pieclops
ability: When Pieclops enters play, heal 1 Damage from each adjacent Creature.

name: Pink Merwitch
ability: Discard a card >>> Deal 1 Damage to each opposing Creature. (Use only once during each of your turns.)

name: Rainbow Eyebat
ability: At the start of your turn, you heal 1 Hit Point for each different Landscape type you control. (Can't go over 25.)

name: Skeletal Hand
ability: FLOOP >>> Discard the top 3 cards of your deck. For each Spell discarded this way, target player discards a card.

name: Snakemint
ability: When Snakemint deals Damage to an opposing player, you heal that many Hit Points. (Can't go over 25.)

name: Squatting Bald Man
ability: Discard a card >>> Heal 1 Damage from Squatting Bald Man. (Use any number of times during each of your turns.)

name: Steakchop
ability: At the start of your turn, discard 2 cards or destroy Steakchop. (Discard after your free draw.)

name: Travelin' Skeleton
ability: FLOOP >>> Travelin' Skeleton and another Creature you control change Lands with each other.

name: Wall of Chocolate
ability: While Wall of Chocolate has no Damage on it, it has +3 ATK.

name: Blue Candy
ability: Heal up to 3 Damage from target Creature you control.

name: Brief Power
ability: Target Useless Swamp Creature you control has +2 ATK this turn.

name: Falling Star
ability: Creatures you control take no Damage from opposing Creatures this turn.

name: Green Candy
ability: Heal or deal 1 Damage to target Creature.

name: Pants of Awesome
ability: Move target Creature you control to an empty Blue Plains Landscape you control, and then draw a card.

name: Piestorm
ability: Each of your Creatures with no Damage has +2 ATK this turn.

name: Ring of Fluffy
ability: Target Creature you control has +X ATK this turn, where X is the amount of Damage on it.

name: Strength Crystal
ability: Target player draws five cards.

name: Subliminal Strength
ability: Target Creature you control has +2 ATK this turn for each Spell you played this turn (including this one).

name: Toilet of Doom
ability: Deal 1 Damage to target Creature for every 5 cards in your discard pile.

name: Volcano
ability: Destroy target Building. You may deal 3 Damage to a Creature in that Lane. Flip your Landscape in that Lane face down.

name: Cave of Solitude
ability: Discard a card >>> Your Creature in this Lane can't be targeted or attacked until the start of your next turn.

name: Mausoleum
ability: Your Creature in this Lane has +1 DEF for every 5 cards in your discard pile.

name: Night Tower
ability: FLOOP >>> If your opponent has no Creatures in this Lane, they discard a card.

name: Pyramidia
ability: FLOOP >>> If you control a Creature in this Lane, gain 1 Action. Use it only to play a Creature in this Lane.

name: Windmill of Health
ability: While your Creature in this Lane has no Damage on it, it has +2 ATK.
